title: Thanks for nothin, Riot
body:
By putting that "should you ever surrender" thing on the front page, no one votes yes. I am currently in a game where:
The team kills are 29/59
The downed turrets are 1/8
And we have an AFK

But since the Ashe and Morg saw "nervur surrundur" being supported by Riot, they decided to vote no.
These are norms, btw. 

And as I'm writing this, the game ended. Lasted 15 minutes more than it should have.
